item.title: 哥伦比亚 Petro 石油公司寻求达成让 Ecopetrol 公司生产委内瑞拉石油和天然气的协议
item.description: 哥伦比亚总统古斯塔沃-佩特罗（Gustavo Petro）在访问加拉加斯后表示，哥伦比亚正在努力达成一项在委内瑞拉生产石油和天然气的协议。【原文：Colombia is working on a deal to produce oil and natural gas in Venezuela, President Gustavo Petro said following a trip to Caracas.】

item.title: 史泰博再融资初见雏形，银行向投资者征求意见
item.description: 据知情人士透露，摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Banks including JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Morgan Stanley are gauging investor investor in a debt package to refinance Staples Inc.’s near-term debt, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 马里军政府暂停政党活动
item.description: 马里军政府周三表示，将以公共秩序为由暂停各政党和政治团体的活动，直至另行通知。【原文：Mali’s military junta said on Wednesday it was suspending the activities of political parties and political associations until further notice, citing reasons of public order.】

item.title: 天齐公司再次出手调查 SQM-Codelco 锂交易
item.description: 应第二大股东天齐锂业公司（Tianqi Lithium Corp. ）的要求，智利 SQM 公司召开了另一次投资者会议，希望进一步澄清与铜业巨头 Codelco 公司的拟议交易。【原文：Chile’s SQM called another investors meeting at the request of its second-largest shareholder, Tianqi Lithium Corp., which seeks greater clarity over a proposed deal with copper giant Codelco.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行称，加拿大企业发行在繁忙的一季度后将放缓
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行资本市场（RBC Capital Markets）的一份报告显示，在经历了有史以来第二繁忙的第一季度之后，加拿大债券市场的公司债券发行将趋于缓和。【原文：Corporate issuance in the Canadian bond market is set to moderate after the second busiest first quarter on record, according to a report from RBC Capital Markets.】

item.title: 溢价枯竭，澳大利亚开始首次绿色债券营销
item.description: 随着一系列主权债券的发行，投资者为持有可持续债务所支付的溢价不断降低，澳大利亚将于周四开始首次发行绿色债券。【原文：Australia will begin marketing its first-ever green bond issuance Thursday as a swath of sovereign issuance narrows the premiums investors pay to hold sustainable debt.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰以 3.35 亿美元贷款的价格击败其他贷款方
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Blue Owl Capital 公司击败了所有其他贷款机构，为天然气服务商 Dresser Utility Solutions 提供了 3.35 亿美元的信用贷款，因为该公司能够提供更低的价格。【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc. beat out all other lenders to provide natural gas servicer, Dresser Utility Solutions, a $335 million credit facility as it was able to offer lower pricing, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 在银行的推动下，纽约市的返聘率接近 80
item.description: 包括高盛集团和摩根大通公司在内的华尔街公司帮助将纽约市的办公楼恢复率推高至疫情前水平的近 80%，根据一项测算，迈阿密也出现了这种反弹。【原文：Wall Street firms including Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and JPMorgan Chase & Co. have helped push New York City’s return-to-office rate to almost 80% of its pre-pandemic levels, a rebound also seen in Miami, according to one measure.】

item.title: 炙手可热的通胀数据打破了债券交易员创纪录的期货赌注
item.description: 在周三美国通胀报告公布前几个小时，市场对利率期货的看涨押注创下了历史纪录，但由于通胀数据强于预期，引发了市场溃败。【原文：A record-sized bullish bet on interest-rate futures that was made hours before Wednesday’s US inflation report blew up in spectacular fashion after a stronger-than-expected reading triggered a market rout.】

item.title: 杰富瑞认为即使美联储不降息，股市也会反弹
item.description: 杰富瑞（Jefferies）的大卫-泽沃斯（David Zervos）认为，周三通胀率高于预期，令交易者感到恐慌，但他们不必担心，他说，无论美联储是否降息，风险资产都能蓬勃发展。【原文：Traders spooked by Wednesday’s hotter-than-expected inflation print need not to worry, according to Jefferies’ David Zervos, who says risk assets can thrive with or without interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 卢拉争端降温，巴西国家石油公司首席执行官将继续掌管巴西石油巨头
item.description: 据知情人士透露，巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）负责人让-保罗-普拉特斯（Jean Paul Prates）将暂时继续掌管这家巴西国有石油巨头，因为政府内部关于该公司首席执行官职位的争斗已经降温。【原文：Petrobras head Jean Paul Prates is set to remain in charge of Brazil’s state-controlled oil giant for now, as an internal government battle over the company’s chief executive role cools down, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 万达同意将詹姆斯-邦德的游艇制造商 Sunseeker 出售给 Lionheart
item.description: 据知情人士透露，大连万达集团股份有限公司下属实体同意将游艇制造商圣汐国际有限公司（Sunseeker International Ltd.）出售给狮心资本（Lionheart Capital）。【原文：An entity affiliated with Dalian Wanda Group Co. agreed to sell Sunseeker International Ltd., a maker of yachts, to Lionheart Capital, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 根据新计划，纽约养老金成本将增加 40 多亿美元
item.description: 如果纽约州州长凯西-霍楚尔（Kathy Hochul）同意一项立法提案，为部分公职人员提供更多福利，那么纳税人为纽约市和纽约州养老金缴纳的费用将增加 40 多亿美元。【原文：Taxpayer contributions to New York City and state pensions would rise by more than $4 billion if Governor Kathy Hochul yields to a legislative proposal that would sweeten benefits for some public employees.】

item.title: 交易低迷，特朗普媒体价值从峰值缩水 43 亿美元
item.description: 前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体初创公司股价持续下滑，这只曾经高高在上的股票正努力争取狂热的交易者，而这些交易者曾在上个月助推了股价的上涨。【原文：Former president Donald Trump’s social media startup keeps sliding as the once high-flying stock struggles to garner the frenzied traders who helped fuel a rally last month.】

item.title: Citadel 的乌比德说，通胀波动是 "游戏的一部分
item.description: Citadel 的一位顶级宏观策略师表示，交易员和政策制定者都有可能过多地解读美国超预期的通胀数据，这令市场感到震惊，并对央行的降息周期产生质疑。【原文：Traders and policymakers alike risk reading too much into the hotter-than-expected US inflation print that jolted markets and called into question the central bank’s interest-rate cutting cycle, according to a top macro strategist at Citadel.】

item.title: 管道股份销售额创 2017 年以来新高，红利吸引买家
item.description: 在主要机构投资者垂涎多汁股息和充足流动性的情况下，北美管道公司的股票以 2017 年以来最快的速度抛售，银行家们表示，市场仍有更大的空间。【原文：Dangling juicy dividends and ample liquidity at major institutional investors, shares of pipeline companies in North America have been selling at the fastest pace since 2017, and bankers say the market remains open for more.】

item.title: KKR 考虑出售或首次公开募股 150 亿美元的 BMC 软件公司
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，KKR & Co.公司正在再次考虑退出 IT 解决方案公司 BMC Software Inc.【原文：KKR & Co. is again reviewing options to exit IT solutions firm BMC Software Inc., which could be worth about $15 billion including debt in a sale or initial public offering, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 英国将允许经纪商收取捆绑费用，推翻 MiFID 规则
item.description: 英国金融监管机构计划允许资产管理公司合并支付研究和交易费用，从而推翻英国曾经支持的一项欧盟规定。【原文：The UK’s financial regulator plans to allow asset managers to pay combined fees for research and trading, reversing a European Union rule that Britain had once championed.】

item.title: 鲍威尔的软着陆之梦岌岌可危，因为交易员在为通胀避险
item.description: 通胀尚未摆脱对市场的控制的迹象已经酝酿了数周。在周三公布的消费者物价指数高于预期，令股市和债券大跌之后，这些迹象已经沸腾。【原文：Signs that inflation has yet to release its grip on markets have simmered for weeks. Now they’re boiling over after Wednesday’s hotter-than-forecast consumer price index sent stocks and bonds reeling.】

item.title: 阿尔卑斯免疫公司收到收购意向后正在权衡各种选择
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿尔派免疫科学公司（Alpine Immune Sciences Inc.该公司股价涨幅高达 17%。【原文：Alpine Immune Sciences Inc., a clinical-stage biotechnology company developing a treatment for inflammatory kidney diseases, is weighing options including a potential sale after attracting takeover interest, according to people with knowledge of the matter. The stock gained as much as 17%.】

item.title: 桥梁垮塌威胁马里兰州交通局的信用评级
item.description: 重建巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥的费用以及资金来源仍然悬而未决。这种不确定性导致穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）下调了对该州交通机构的评级展望。【原文：The costs to rebuild Baltimore’s Francis Scott Key Bridge, and where the funds will come from, are still very much up in the air. That uncertainty has led Moody’s Ratings to lower its outlook on the state transportation agency.】

item.title: 汇丰银行与其他公司一道退出阿根廷米莱经济改造计划
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊正试图吸引外国投资，以帮助稳定摇摇欲坠的经济。然而，一些国际大公司却放弃了阿根廷。【原文：Argentine President Javier Milei is trying to draw foreign investment to help stabilize a faltering economy. Some big international companies are abandoning the country instead.】

item.title: 法国法院暂停植物食品肉类标签新禁令
item.description: 法国禁止在非肉类食品上使用肉类标签的努力再次受阻。【原文：France’s efforts to ban meat labels for non-meat foods have been hobbled once again.】

item.title: 英国石油公司计划从五月起对德国林根炼油厂进行维护
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，英国石油公司（BP Plc）计划从 5 月底开始对其林根炼油厂进行维护。【原文：BP Plc is planning maintenance at its Lingen oil refinery from about the end of May, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 高盛将美联储在 2024 年削减两次货币政策的预期从三次改为两次
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Economists at Goldman Sachs Group Inc. are forecasting two Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts this year instead of three after Wednesday’s report showing consumer prices rose more than estimated in March.】

item.title: 部分城市通胀重燃，洛杉矶房价上涨 4
item.description: 随着从纽约到檀香山等美国各大城市通胀重新抬头，洛杉矶的物价创下一年多来的最大涨幅。【原文：Los Angeles is seeing the biggest price gains in more than a year as inflation reawakens across US cities from New York to Honolulu.】

item.title: 美元创数月来最大涨幅，因CPI升温被认为会降低利率下调幅度
item.description: 在火热的美国通胀数据促使交易员们缩减他们对美联储今年降息次数的预期后，美元创下了自一月份以来的最大涨幅。【原文：The dollar surged the most since January after hot US inflation data pushed traders to ratchet back the number of interest-rate cuts they expect this year from the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 英国能源价格将比此前预测进一步下降
item.description: 英国电价将比预期进一步下降，从而缓解家庭能源账单，但仍远高于危机前水平。【原文：UK electricity prices are set to fall further than expected, easing household energy bills but remaining well above pre-crisis levels.】

item.title: Leerink 借助罗斯柴尔德的 Hotchandani 进行医疗保健交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Leerink Partners 聘请了 Rothschild & Co. 常务董事 Timothy Hotchandani，专注于涉及生命科学工具和诊断公司的医疗保健交易。【原文：Leerink Partners hired Rothschild & Co. managing director Timothy Hotchandani to focus on health-care dealmaking involving life-science tools and diagnostics companies, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 巴西回击美国放弃对乙醇进口征收关税的压力
item.description: 巴西农业部长卡洛斯-法瓦罗（Carlos Fávaro）表示，尽管拜登政府提出了 "强硬 "的抱怨，但巴西将继续对美国进口乙醇征收关税。【原文：Brazil will maintain tariffs on US ethanol imports despite “tough” complaints from the Biden administration, said Agriculture Minister Carlos Fávaro.】
